snippet: Pittsburgh and West Virginia agreed to renew one of the oldest rivalries in college football, signing for a four-game series beginning in 2022.
abstract: Rival college football teams Pittsburgh and West Virginia agree to compete in four-game series called the Backyard Brawl.
lead_paragraph: Pittsburgh and West Virginia agreed to renew one of the oldest rivalries in college football, signing for a four-game series beginning in 2022.

headline.print_headline: College Football; Rivalry Dating to 1895 Is Renewed
